name: omnivorous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
naturally able to eat both plants and meat: Pigs are omnivorous animals. Compare
carnivorous (carnivore)
herbivorous (herbivore)
enthusiastic and interested in many different areas of a subject: an omnivorous reader
